8ball.question: That doesn't look like a question.
answers: test√π, test√π, test√π test√π! test√π test√π test√π

choose.description:
Choose between multiple options.
You have to split every choice with a comma.
examples: Go to school, Do onlime school
choose.nochoose: Not enough options to pick from.

rps.invalid: This isn't a valid option. Try rock, paper, or scissors.

examples: How to make a Discord bot

emojify.unsupported: Characters must be either a letter or number. Anything else is unsupported
emojify.toomany: Emoji is too big to fit in a message!

roast.description: Roast someone! If you suck at roasting them yourself.
roasts: I'd give you a nasty look but you've already got one.
If you're going to be two-faced, at least make one of them pretty.
The only way you'll ever get laid is if you crawl up a chicken's ass and wait.
It looks like your face caught fire and someone tried to put it out with a hammer.
I'd like to see things from your point of view, but I can't seem to get my head that far up your ass.
Scientists say the universe is made up of neutrons, protons and electrons. They forgot to mention morons.
Why is it acceptable for you to be an idiot but not for me to point it out?
Just because you have one doesn't mean you need to act like one.
Someday you'll go far... and I hope you stay there.
Which sexual position produces the ugliest children? Ask your mother.
No, those pants don't make you look fatter - how could they?
Save your breath - you'll need it to blow up your date.
If you really want to know about mistakes, you should ask your parents.
Whatever kind of look you were going for, you missed.
Hey, you have something on your chin... no, the 3rd one down.
I don't know what makes you so stupid, but it really works.
You are proof that evolution can go in reverse.
Brains aren't everything. In your case they're nothing.
I thought of you today. It reminded me to take the garbage out.
You're so ugly when you look in the mirror, your reflection looks away.
Quick - check your face! I just found your nose in my business.
It's better to let someone think you're stupid than open your mouth and prove it.
You're such a beautiful, intelligent, wonderful person. Oh I'm sorry, I thought we were having a lying competition.
I'd slap you but I don't want to make your face look any better.
You have the right to remain silent because whatever you say will probably be stupid anyway.
roast.roastyou: Uh?!! Nice try! I am not going to roast myself. Instead I am going to roast you now.

examples: convert your text to small caps!!

messages.single:
The quotes are automatically generated by an AI,
so those might not always be family-friendly.
The image has been spoiled.
messages.multi:
The quotes are automatically generated by an AI,
so those might not always be family-friendly.
The images have been spoiled.

whothisis.description: I don't know who he is

Music.name: Music
Music.description: Listen to your favorite music with StrapBot!

ensure_voice.notconnected: I'm not connected to any voice channel.
ensure_voice.join: Please join a voice channel first.
ensure_voice.perms: I need the permissions to connect to your voice channel and speak.
ensure_voice.samevc: You need to be in the same voice channel.

summon.description: Summons the bot to a voice channel.
summon.error: You are neither connected to a voice channel nor specified a channel to join.
summon.alr: Already connected to a voice channel.

leave.description: Clears the queue and leaves the voice channel.
leave.error: Not connected to any voice channel.

stop.description: Stops playing song and clears the queue.

skip.error: Not playing any music right now...

vote.success: Your skip vote has been added!
vote.error: You have already voted to skip this song.

loop.error: Nothing being played at the moment.

play.fetching: Fetching song(s), this might take a while...

search.error: An error occurred while processing this request: {}
search.choose: **Type a number to choose it, or `cancel` to exit**

volume.nothing: Nothing is being played at the moment.
volume.info: At the moment volume is set to {}%.
volume.done: The player's volume has been set to {}%

config user lang.description:
Configure your language.
**NOTE:** the only valid languages
are `en` and `it` for now.

embed.title: Language changed!
embed.description: You set your language to English!

config server lang.description:
Configure server's language.
**NOTE:** the only valid languages
are `en` and `it` for now.

embed.title: Language changed!
embed.description: You set the server's language to English!

This is a list of commands in this bot.

**{prefix}help** - Shows this message.
**{prefix}config** - Configure StrapBot.
**{prefix}report** - Report a bug to StrapBot developers.
**Tip:** You can enable some hidden beta commands by running `{prefix}config user beta`

invite.title: Invite me!
invite.description_:
[Click here](https://strapbot.xyz/invite) to invite me to your server!
Also join our [support server](https://discord.gg/G4de45Bywg)!

servers.description: Shows the amount of servers I'm in.
servers.title: Total servers.

setlog.test:
This channel has been set up to log actions.
This means that I will send bans/warns/kicks here.
**NOTE:** Audit logs (message delete/edit, channel/role creation/deletion etc) is not supported for now.

error.title: Error
error.description: I don't have enough permissions to write in that channel.

success.title: Success
success.description: {} has been set up as log channel.

muterole.error: Muted role is already set up.
muterole.error_footer: If you want to change role, just mention it.
muterole.name: Muted
muterole.done: The muted role has been set to {}.

warn.msg_: You have been warned in {g} for: {r}
warn.logged: Warning has been logged for {}. I couldn't warn them, they disabled DMs.

kick.error: I don't have enough permissions to kick them.
kick.msg_: You have been kicked in {g} for: {r}

ban.error: I don't have enough permissions to ban them.
ban.msg_: You have been banned in {g} for: {r}

mute.notset:
You must set up a muted role first.
To set one, run `{}muterole (@role)`.
mute.error: I don't have enough permissions to add the role.
mute.msg_: You have been muted in {g} for: {r}

unmute.notset:
You don't have a muted role set up.
You will have to unmute them manually.
unmute.error: I don't have enough permissions to remove the role.

nuke.description: Nukes (deletes EVERY message in) a channel.
nuke.error: I don't have enough permissions to nuke the channel.

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description:
This command will delete EVERY SINGLE MESSAGE in {} channel!
If you are sure and responsible about what might happen send "Yes, do as I say!". Otherwise, send anything else to abort.
**Unexpected bad things might happen if you decide to continue!**

purge.lt1: You can only purge at least 1 message.
purge.ut2: You can only purge up to 2000 messages.
purge.use_nuke: Use {}nuke to purge the entire chat.
purge.error: I don't have enough permissions to delete messages.
